TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {31625=§ 2328 - Release of technical data under Freedom of Information Act: recovery of costs, 30402=§ 2319 - Encouragement of new competitors, 32843=§ 2337 - Life-cycle management and product support, 61052=DoD, GSA, and NASA are proposing to amend the Federal Acquisition Regulation (FAR) to further implement the inflation adjustment of acquisition-related dollar thresholds. A statute requires an adjustment every five years of acquisition-related thresholds for inflation using the Consumer Price Index for all urban consumers, except for the Construction Wage Rate Requirements statute (Davis-Bacon Act), Service Contract Labor Standards statute, and trade agreements thresholds. DoD, GSA, and NASA are also proposing to use the same methodology to adjust nonstatutory FAR acquisition-related thresholds in 2015., 32512=§ 2334 - Independent cost estimation and cost analysis, 32097=§ 2331 - Procurement of services: contracts for professional and technical services, 31498=§ 2327 - Contracts: consideration of national security objectives, 29932=§ 2315 - Law inapplicable to the procurement of automatic data processing equipment and services for certain defense purposes, 33584=Title 48 published on 2014-10-01, 29796=§ 2314 - Laws inapplicable to agencies named in section 2303 of this title, 32339=§ 2333 - Joint policies on requirements definition, contingency program management, and contingency contracting, 29470=§ 2312 - Remission of liquidated damages, 31380=§ 2326 - Undefinitized contractual actions: restrictions, 30119=§ 2316 - Disclosure of identity of contractor, 32242=§ 2332 - Share-in-savings contracts, 31853=§ 2330 - Procurement of contract services: management structure, 38418=DoD, GSA, and NASA issued a proposed rule (FAR Case 2014-025) on May 28, 2015, amending the Federal Acquisition Regulation (FAR) to implement Executive Order (E.O.) 13673, “Fair Pay and Safe Workplaces,” which is designed to improve contractor compliance with labor laws and increase efficiency and cost savings in Federal contracting. The deadline for submitting comments is being extended from July 27, 2015, to August 11, 2015, to provide additional time for interested parties to provide comments on the FAR case. The due date for comments on DOL's Guidance for Executive Order 13673, “Fair Pay and Safe Workplaces”, which also implements the E.O., is being extended to August 11, 2015 as well., 30600=§ 2321 - Validation of proprietary data restrictions, 30226=§ 2317 - Repealed., 29328=§ 2311 - Assignment and delegation of procurement functions and responsibilities, 29572=§ 2313 - Examination of records of contractor, 31773=§ 2329 - Repealed., 28495=§ 2306 - Kinds of contracts, 31180=§ 2324 - Allowable costs under defense contracts, 28251=§ 2305 - Contracts: planning, solicitation, evaluation, and award procedures, 27295=§ 2303 - Applicability of chapter, 26590=§ 2301 - Repealed. Pub. L. 103–355 , title I , § 1501(a), Oct. 13, 1994, 108 Stat. 3296 ], 31290=§ 2325 - Restructuring costs, 26746=§ 2302 - Definitions, 32749=§ 2336 - Renumbered § 2679], 55454=DoD, GSA, and NASA are proposing to amend the Federal Acquisition Regulation (FAR) to implement a section of the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA) for Fiscal Year (FY) 2013 to include in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System (FAPIIS), to the extent practicable, identification of any immediate owner or subsidiary, and all predecessors of an offeror that held a Federal contract or grant within the last three years. The objective is to provide a more comprehensive understanding of the performance and integrity of the corporation before awarding a Federal contract., 29229=§ 2310 - Determinations and decisions, 30714=§ 2322 - Repealed., 30306=§ 2318 - Advocates for competition, 29023=§ 2308 - Buy-to-budget acquisition: end items, 30505=§ 2320 - Rights in technical data, 14244=DoD, GSA, and NASA are issuing a correction to FAR Case 2012-023; Uniform Procurement Identification (Item III), which was published in the Federal Register at 79 FR 61739, October 14, 2014., 29130=§ 2309 - Allocation of appropriations, 28934=§ 2307 - Contract financing, 27472=§ 2304 - Contracts: competition requirements, 30794=§ 2323 - Contract goal for small disadvantaged businesses and certain institutions of higher education, 32628=§ 2335 - Prohibition on collection of political information}
